pages.title: Capturing the Essence
pages.text: As you might have noticed by now, just $(l)Magic Mushrooms$() won't cut it when attempting to perform greater magic. You'll need to extract their $(l)essences$(): the purest form of the magic inside the fungi. To do this procedure, you'll need an $(l)Essence Extractor$():

To extract, you'll need 3 glass bottles, your mushroom of choice and a $(l)Catalyst$(). Catalysts are special items that stimulate the extraction process. Each fungi type has a specific catalyst that is required, as you can see on the next pages:
The pure essence of the $(c)$(l)Impetus Mushroom$(). $()Its catalyst is $(c)$(l)Blaze Powder$(): the rests of a powerful beast that fought until its last breath.
The pure essence of the $(3)$(l)Clypeus Mushroom$(). $()Its catalyst is $(3)$(l)Prismarine Crystals$(): part of a bigger structure that protected those inside it.
The pure essence of the $(d)$(l)Utilis Mushroom$(). $()Its catalyst is $(d)$(l)Popped Chorus Fruit$(): the result of the adaptability required to thrive on a dire ambient.
The pure essence of the $(a)$(l)Vivifica Mushroom$(). $()Its catalyst is $(a)$(l)Scute$(): the outcome of one of the phases of the never-stopping cycle of life.
